org.aslab.om.metacontrol.action
Class ComponentAction

java.lang.Object
  org.aslab.om.ecl.action.Action
      org.aslab.om.metacontrol.action.ComponentAction

public class ComponentAction
extends Action

this class is the internal representation of an action in the ComponentsECL, consisting basically of the action command and attributes with additional info, such as the component spec it addresses (target) and actions that must be completed before this one is executed.

This class follows the following state machine:

*

Author:
chcorbato

getTarget

public CompGoalAtomTracker getTarget()

failure

public boolean failure()
Returns:
true if the command for this action is in failure, or if any of the actions this one depends on is in failure. Otherwise returns false
